news.title: Trust these numbers? Economists see a lot of flaws in delayed CPI report showing downward inflation
news.description: Thursday saw the release of a much lighter-than-expected inflation report for November, and economists are already questioning its significance.

news.title: Friday could be a wild day of trading on Wall Street. Here's why
news.description: December options expirations are typically the biggest of the year, but this one eclipses all prior records, Goldman said.

news.title: Trump signs executive order reclassifying cannabis, opening door to broader weed access
news.description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday reclassifying marijuana as a Schedule III substance with looser restrictions.
